com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.options

Class EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.foreach.across.modules.entity.views.bootstrapui.options.EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OptionIterableBuilder

    public class EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder
extends Object
implements OptionIterableBuilder
    Generates OptionFormElementBuilders for a particular entity type, where the list of options is fetched through an EntityQueryExecutor and custom EntityQuery. By default an EntityQuery without parameters will be used, resulting in all entities being returned.

    A query can be specified using either an EntityQuery instance or a EQL statement.

    Use forEntityConfiguration(EntityConfiguration) to easily create an EntityQueryOptionIterableBuilder configured with the entity query support for a particular EntityConfiguration.

    Author:
    Arne Vandamme
